title: 求一个1.7.10水桶服能用的npc和随机传送插件！
author: Thousand1000

replies.author: Aleks_Kavli
replies.txt_content:

如果是核心请注明需要的是
bukkit spigot1.7.10 spigot1.7-1.8

replies.author: Thousand1000
replies.txt_content:
tsd1 发表于 2015-3-29 17:32
npc当然用citizenshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/citizens/
随机传送ess自带http://dev.bukkit.org ...
ess的随机传送指令是啥？放在指令方块上也能用吗？

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
